content: stitch count per side 2 single_crochet 20 half_double_crochet 1 chain-3 space 10 join with a standing double_crochet in any chain-2 corner space chain 5 double_crochet in same space p1 2 *double_crochet in next 8 sts single_crochet in next st ch1 skip next 2 sts in chain-3 space 5 double_crochet chain 3 5 double_crochet p3 ch1 skip next 2 sts single_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 8 sts in chain-2 corner space double_crochet chain 5 double_crochet * repeat from * to * 4 times join to standing double_crochet fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per side 2 single_crochet 28 double_crochet 2 chain-1 spaces 1 chain-3 space original design by helen shrimpton ♥ copyright © 2015 ♥ all rights reserved 11 join with a standing single_crochet in the 3rd stitch before any chain-5 corner space p1 *chain 1 in chain-5 corner space 5 double_crochet chain 3 5 double_crochet p2 ch1 skip next 2 sts single_crochet in next st chain 2 twice skip next 2 sts single_crochet in next 2 sts in point group bphdc in next 10 sts skipping chain-3 space p3 single_crochet in next 2 sts chain 2 skip 2 stitches single_crochet in next st twice * repeat from * to * 4 times join to standing single_crochet with sl-st stitch count per side 8 single_crochet 10 bphdc 10 double_crochet 4 chain-2 spaces 12 *skip chain-1 space single_crochet in next 5 sts in chain-3 corner space single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 5 sts p1 skip next chain-1 space sl-st in next st 3 half_double_crochet in next chain-2 space twice sl-st in next st skip next st in point group single_crochet in next 5 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts skip next st sl-st in next st 3 half_double_crochet in chain-2 space twice sl-st in next stitch * repeat from * to * 4 times join to closing sl-st r11 fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per side 23sc 12 half_double_crochet original design by helen shrimpton ♥ copyright © 2015 ♥ all rights reserved hint in this round you will be working in sets of stitches again there are 2 sets of 6 either side of each corner 4 sets of 3 in groups of 2 on either side of the point group and the point group of 11 stitches it sounds wordy and complicated but really it s very simple just keep counting and remember that the slip stitches from the last round do not count as stitches 13 join with standing blsc in either chain of any chain-2 corner space chain 2 blsc in same st p1 2 *bpsc in next 2 sts bphdc in next 2 sts bpdc in next 2 sts p3 bpdc in next st bphdc in next st bpdc in next st twice p4 in point group bpdc in next 2 sts bphdc in next 2 sts bpsc in next 3 sts bphdc in next 2 sts bpdc in next 2 sts p5 bpdc in next st bphdc
